Original:
《回覆店家》首先恭喜闆娘看起來非常年輕。
再來就要給「年輕人」社會教育了：不是說辛苦、爬高漆油漆，別人就要覺得妳的裝潢很有格調，懂？
自己切醃串的店也不是只有妳這間；別人更大間、租金更貴、裝潢更花心思、更多座位、更多服務生的店可以1串賣50？大店投入的R&D研發的口味跟調味料或許還更多。還是妳的串燒台灣第一好吃呢？

這是我主觀的評論，而且我講的一切是「就事論事」。就算我當天對於貴店的待客之道有不好的感受，我也沒加油添醋，說招呼客人的小妹妹可能沒家教沒教養之類的人身攻擊。
因此，妳反過來嘴「我」沒格調，一時可能很爽，但是已經顯現闆娘妳的人格了。這就是一間，客人不滿意有主觀的負評，闆娘就會嘴客人的店家。如果我今天真的用餐，然後不喜歡，是不是要被妳嘴不懂得品嚐「美食」？

如果純粹賣賣串燒做社區的生意，有錢就賺，沒錢就算了的話，那當然沒關係。有心想要經營的話，當然裝潢不能那麼馬虎。牆上貼貼東西、模型放在冰櫃裡、結帳台、門面就一個招牌沒有裝潢，如果妳覺得已經夠好了，那也是妳的權利。

自己做有自己的苦，但是無論什麼理由，別人都有資格評論。不是妳很辛苦經營，所有人都要為妳鼓掌一樣。

非常糟糕的一家店
晚上8點多跟同事路過，想說小酌一下
走進去的時候，店裡一個人都沒有，只有一個短頭髮的妹妹，在滑手機。

我們都已經走進來了，居然看了一眼繼續滑她的手機。

現在是家裡沒大人？？？？？
這位妹妹是店員，還是老闆女兒之類的嗎？？？
我就站在妳面前看妳滑手機滑到什麼時候。

不懂禮貌，不帶位，問問題也不回答。同事看了我一眼，示意說我們隨意坐下。

結果
結果
結果
點菜的單子用丟的丟到桌上。

很好，我跟同事兩個直接起身走出去。

沒甚麼格調的店家，配上沒禮貌的店員。菜單看了一眼：東西少、又貴、沒特色。連吃喝的必要都沒有。
EN:
"Reply to the store" first congratulations on Ban Niang's looks very young.
Then you have to give "young people" social education: not to say that hard work, climbing high paint paint, others have to think that your decoration is very stylish, understand?
You are not the only one for your own pickled skewers; others are larger, more expensive, more thoughtful, more seats, and more waiter stores can be sold for 50?The taste and seasonings developed by R & D invested in large stores may be more.Or are your skewers the first to cook Taiwan?

This is my subjective comment, and everything I talk about is "discussing things."Even if I had a bad feeling for the hospitality of Guidian that day, I did not cheer up vinegar, and said that the younger sister who said hello to the guests may not have a family attack and no education.
Therefore, you have no style when you come over, and you may be very cool for a while, but you have already revealed your personality.This is a room. The guests are not satisfied with subjective negative reviews, and Ban Niang will mouth the guest's shop.If I really dine today, and then don't like it, do you want to be talked about "food"?

If it is purely selling skewers to make a community business and make money if you have money. If you have no money, of course, it does not matter.If you want to operate, of course, the decoration cannot be so sloppy.The wall is sticked on the freezer, the model is placed in the freezer, the checkout table, and the facade is not decorated. If you think it is good enough, it is also your right.

Do your own suffering by yourself, but no matter what the reason, others are qualified to comment.It's not that you are working hard, and everyone has to applaud you.

Very bad shop
Passing with my colleagues at 8 o'clock in the evening, I want to say a drink
When I walked in, there was no one in the store, only a short -haired sister, sliding her mobile phone.

We all had come in, and we looked at her mobile phone and continued to slide her mobile phone.

Is there no adult at home now?IntersectionIntersectionIntersectionIntersection
Is this sister a clerk or the daughter of the boss?IntersectionIntersection
I just stood in front of you to see when your phone slipped.

Don't understand politeness, do not bring position, and ask questions without answering questions.My colleague glanced at me and signaled that we sat down at will.

result
result
result
The order of ordering is thrown on the table with throwing.

Very good, two and my colleagues and I got up directly and walked out.

There is no style of stores, with a rude shop assistant.The menu glanced at: there are few things, expensive, and unique.There is no need to eat and drink.
